name: Clear Blue Skies Part Two
description:
| SciFi | Kinetic Visual Novel | Slice of Life |

⚠️ Please read the content warning below before playing. If any of the content below upsets you in some way, please do not play the visual novel. Always prioritise your mental health first and foremost in any situation. ⚠️

Content Warning (possible spoilers):

  • Mentions of Death
  • Child Neglect

If any of these topics again trigger you in any way, it is recommended not to play. If you know the warnings and continue on playing, please note that this is fiction. I do not and will never support any of these actions displayed in the visual novel.  If any of these occurrences happen in real life, it is purely coincidental.

Tetra is by far the 'normalist' adult you could ever see on the outside, but many secrets and desires are lurking within.   She hasn't had it all given to her on a silver plate when she was a child.   Her life was full of disappointments and regrets, but can she fix them when she has the time now to? Dive deep and experience the second/last instalment of Clear Blue Skies.  Set an millennium later, Clear Blue Skies Part Two is opening up even wider and more adventures await for you to unlock.
  • 41k word count.
  • 1 CG and a Gallery.
  • And a chuck load full of immerse storytelling from yours truly, 🌸StrxwberryBliss🍓!
  Aika Sato - Creator and Artist (https://strxwberrybliss.itch.io/)  Imasu Suzuki- Co-Writer  Sakura Satori- Proofreader and Co-Creator (https://itch.io/profile/mysteriouscat)  Ruelle - Madness (℗ 2016 Craft Recordings., Distributed by Concord.)  Ajeb- Visual Novel Sprites (https://www.deviantart.com/ajebfly/art/free-visual-novel-sprites-CC-BY-NC-3-0-836048248)  Rait Visual Works - Character Silhouettes (https://witching-metal.itch.io/character-silhouettes-bureaucrats)  Sound Library - Static Radio Sound Effect  c152, shiruku, chirrex - Romantic Night  MokkaMusic - Midnight Cyberpunk  White Bat Audio - Broken  White Bat Audio - New Beginnings  MokkaMusic- Cyberpunk Trailer  Aim to Head Official - Eclectic  Aim to Head Official - Carbon  Infraction - Synthwave  Game Boy Infraction - Cyberpunk 2077  Fiera Ryan - Cyberpunk Background (https://fieraryan.itch.io/nightclub-pack)  Fiera Ryan - SciFi Flying Cars Pack (194 Cars) (https://fieraryan.itch.io/scifi-flying-cars-pack)  Lornn - Cyberpunk Background (https://lornn.itch.io/cyberpunk-backgrounds)  Cybrpnuk Font - junkohanhero (https://www.dafont.com/cybrpnuk.font) Additional Info: Hey, my most precious strxwberries🍓! I'm so happy for your support and your continous engagement in everything I do!  You need to know you are all so sweet and caring because everyone else deserves to know how beautiful you guys truly are! I'm sorry for not posting my games as much as I used to and it's mainly because of school😒... But I hope ya'll understand as I'm a high school writer and the position I'm in at the moment, but anyway, enough of school.  I hope all of your dreams come true and you all stay sweet like the beautiful people you are! “I realized that I should think twice before I do anything and not forget where I am, no matter what situation I may be in.” -⭐️Golden Maknae⭐️
